mapper.insert: insert into score (planId, score, userTel, indexId, reviewTime) values (#{planId}, #{score}, #{userTel}, #{indexId}, #{reviewTime})
mapper.select: select score, indexId, scoreId from score where userTel = #{userTel} and planId = #{planId}
mapper.update: update score set score = #{score} where scoreId = #{scoreId}
